scripts.merge:main: git checkout main && git merge develop && git push origin main && git checkout develop
scripts.push:develop: f() { git add . && git commit -m "$1" && git push origin develop; }; f
scripts.build:shorten: cd lambda/shortenURL && npm i && rm -Rf ../dist && mkdir -p ../dist && zip -r ../dist/shortenURL.zip index.mjs node_modules package.json
scripts.build:redirect: cd lambda/redirect && mkdir -p ../dist && zip -r ../dist/redirect.zip index.mjs package.json
scripts.build:stats: cd lambda/stats && mkdir -p ../dist && zip -r ../dist/stats.zip index.mjs package.json
